fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If you are visited while worshiping, you will roleblock and mark all of your visitors.
-Marked players do not know that they are marked.
-Cult attacks against marked targets are upgraded by one tier.
-If a marked player visits you again at any point, you will deal a Powerful Attack to them. This does not count as a “Cult attack” upgraded by your mark.
-You will know how many people you mark each night, but not who.
-This role is converted from Town Evil roles.
